title: Rough Riders Western | The Gunman from Bodie (1941) by Spencer Gordon Bennet | Colorized Movie

sources.title: Rough Riders Western | The Gunman from Bodie (1941) by Spencer Gordon Bennet | Colorized Movie
sources.description:
A mysterious stranger who arrives in the town of Bodie, seeking vengeance for a past injustice. 
As tensions rise and secrets are revealed, the stranger becomes embroiled in a web of betrayal and deceit, leading to a thrilling showdown that will determine the town's fate. 

Original title: The Gunman from Bodie (1941) AKA: Bad Man from Brodie

Black & White version: https://youtu.be/oqcAabjVCpE


Director: Spencer Gordon Bennet
Writer: Adele Buffington
Stars: Buck Jones, Tim McCoy, Raymond Hatton
Genres: Classics, Crime, Western, Drama


00:00 Full Movie (with subtitles)
05:51 A ranch is sold to a new owner, offering a high-paying job to a skilled foreman. Joe is hired as the foreman, despite another candidate being considered.
10:05 Cowboy encounters trouble when a stranger brings news of a child in need, leading to suspicion and conflict.
19:19 Law enforcement officer investigates a man's identity in a Western town, seeking help and encountering a cute child.
20:32 Law enforcement officers investigate a murder, receive a message from a wanted man's mother, and discuss a reward for apprehending him.
26:09 Conflict arises when Marshall confronts Cook about a murder, leading to a showdown with the Sheriff.
32:08 Law enforcement investigates a murder case involving Bill Cook and Pete Gibbs, leading to suspicions and confrontations.
37:53 Unexpected alliances form in a small town as tensions rise over land disputes and a fugitive on the run.
43:28 Unexpected events unfold in Borden as Joe suspects Bodie Bronson's involvement in a mysterious incident.
49:31 Law enforcement officer deals with gang violence and plans to confront a notorious criminal in the Wild West.
54:26 Undercover operation to catch Wyatt and his hired guns at a cattle ranch leads to a tense standoff.
1:00:03 Encounter between Thong Che Roberts and an acquaintance leads to reminiscing about past experiences and plans for the future.


@CultCinemaClassics
